resume_snippet: SUMMARY: Dr. Keith Hostetler has more than 35 years of experience in a wide spectrum of scientific and regulatory fields related to the safe use of chemicals in commerce. After a start in the food industry, he progressed through a number of roles in toxicology, product safety and regulatory affairs, marketing, new business development for both large publicly traded multinational corporations, and smaller, privately held entities.
